title: Nvidia reports record sales and beats on earnings again, sending stock higher
text:
Why is there no EV love for Ford and GM? Cathie Wood says â€˜they don't have the DNA for this brave new world' of electric cars

General Motors and Ford Motor have made strides in growing their EV business but investment manager Cathie Wood says it may be too little, too late. See full story.

Gen Z is wildly unrealistic about how much money stocks, crypto and other investments will give them for retirement

The future always looks bright in a bull market. See full story.

Social Security proposal would raise revenue and temporarily enhance benefits

Changes that expire in 5 years could create real problems See full story.

How Apple's buyback party could continue for 15 more years

Apple Inc.'s aggressive stock buybacks have been a key contributor to earnings growth, and one analyst sees a path that would allow the company to continue its strong pattern of share repurchases for some 15 more years. See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

The Congressional Budget Office is expected to release new estimates by Friday on how much tax revenue a beefed-up IRS would generate. See full story.
